quotes.quote: The only way to do great work is to love what you do.
quotes.author: Steve Jobs

quotes.quote: In three words I can sum up everything I've learned about life: it goes on.
quotes.author: Robert Frost

quotes.quote: Success is not final, failure is not fatal: It is the courage to continue that counts.
quotes.author: Winston Churchill

quotes.quote: The greatest glory in living lies not in never falling, but in rising every time we fall.
quotes.author: Nelson Mandela

quotes.quote: The future belongs to those who believe in the beauty of their dreams.
quotes.author: Eleanor Roosevelt

quotes.quote: Life is really simple, but we insist on making it complicated.
quotes.author: Confucius

quotes.quote: The only thing necessary for the triumph of evil is for good men to do nothing.
quotes.author: Edmund Burke

quotes.quote: The journey of a thousand miles begins with one step.
quotes.author: Lao Tzu

quotes.quote: You miss 100% of the shots you don't take.
quotes.author: Wayne Gretzky

quotes.quote: The greatest wealth is to live content with little.
quotes.author: Plato

quotes.quote: Do not dwell in the past, do not dream of the future, concentrate the mind on the present moment.
quotes.author: Buddha

quotes.quote: The only limit to our realization of tomorrow will be our doubts of today.
quotes.author: Franklin D. Roosevelt

quotes.quote: Believe you can and you're halfway there.
quotes.author: Theodore Roosevelt

quotes.quote: Life is what happens when you're busy making other plans.
quotes.author: John Lennon

quotes.quote: The best time to plant a tree was 20 years ago. The second best time is now.
quotes.author: Chinese Proverb

quotes.quote: The future depends on what you do today.
quotes.author: Mahatma Gandhi

quotes.quote: Success usually comes to those who are too busy to be looking for it.
quotes.author: Henry David Thoreau

quotes.quote: Don't watch the clock; do what it does. Keep going.
quotes.author: Sam Levenson

quotes.quote: Life is short, and it's up to you to make it sweet.
quotes.author: Sarah Louise Delany

quotes.quote: The only thing standing between you and your dream is the will to try and the belief that it is actually possible.
quotes.author: Joel Brown

quotes.quote: The biggest risk is not taking any risk. In a world that is changing quickly, the only strategy that is guaranteed to fail is not taking risks.
quotes.author: Mark Zuckerberg

quotes.quote: You have within you right now, everything you need to deal with whatever the world can throw at you.
quotes.author: Brian Tracy

quotes.quote: When something is important enough, you do it even if the odds are not in your favor.
quotes.author: Elon Musk

quotes.quote: The pessimist complains about the wind; the optimist expects it to change; the realist adjusts the sails.
quotes.author: William Arthur Ward

quotes.quote: What lies behind us and what lies before us are tiny matters compared to what lies within us.
quotes.author: Ralph Waldo Emerson

quotes.quote: The only thing that stands between you and your dream is the will to try and the belief that it is actually possible.
quotes.author: Joel Brown

quotes.quote: Happiness is not something readymade. It comes from your own actions.
quotes.author: Dalai Lama

quotes.quote: Challenges are what make life interesting and overcoming them is what makes life meaningful.
quotes.author: Joshua J. Marine

quotes.quote: Don't count the days, make the days count.
quotes.author: Muhammad Ali

quotes.quote: You are never too old to set another goal or to dream a new dream.
quotes.author: C.S. Lewis

quotes.quote: The harder the conflict, the greater the triumph.
quotes.author: George Washington

quotes.quote: Success is not the key to happiness. Happiness is the key to success. If you love what you are doing, you will be successful.
quotes.author: Albert Schweitzer

quotes.quote: The only thing standing between you and your goal is the story you keep telling yourself as to why you can't achieve it.
quotes.author: Jordan Belfort

quotes.quote: Life is 10% what happens to us and 90% how we react to it.
quotes.author: Charles R. Swindoll

quotes.quote: Change your thoughts and you change your world.
quotes.author: Norman Vincent Peale

quotes.quote: Believe in yourself and all that you are. Know that there is something inside you that is greater than any obstacle.
quotes.author: Christian D. Larson

quotes.quote: Your time is limited, don't waste it living someone else's life.
quotes.author: Steve Jobs

quotes.quote: The only limit to our realization of tomorrow will be our doubts of today.
quotes.author: Franklin D. Roosevelt

quotes.quote: The true test of leadership is how well you function in a crisis.
quotes.author: Brian Tracy

quotes.quote: The more I want to get something done, the less I call it work.
quotes.author: Richard Bach

quotes.quote: The best revenge is massive success.
quotes.author: Frank Sinatra

quotes.quote: The harder I work, the luckier I get.
quotes.author: Samuel Goldwyn

quotes.quote: Success is walking from failure to failure with no loss of enthusiasm.
quotes.author: Winston Churchill

quotes.quote: The only thing we have to fear is fear itself.
quotes.author: Franklin D. Roosevelt

quotes.quote: The only thing you can control is your effort and your attitude.
quotes.author: Mark Cuban

quotes.quote: The only thing worse than starting something and failing is not starting something.
quotes.author: Seth Godin

quotes.quote: The best way to predict your future is to create it.
quotes.author: Peter Drucker

quotes.quote: There are no shortcuts to any place worth going.
quotes.author: Beverly Sills

quotes.quote: Don't be pushed around by the fears in your mind. Be led by the dreams in your heart.
quotes.author: Roy T. Bennett

quotes.quote: The best time to plant a tree was 20 years ago. The second best time is now.
quotes.author: Chinese Proverb
